text:
The summariser line tied to a thread group is including the time delay caused by the setUp Threads on the first record to be processed.  This can be significant if the setUp Threads take more than a couple of seconds to complete.  The start time of the test should start after the setUp steps are completed.

This error seems to have been introduced in JMeter 2.13 as JMeter 2.12 (and before) works properly by not starting the timer until setUp is complete.
creator: j.r.titko.professional@gmail.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:

Test case showing issue

Hi,
After further analysis I am not sure what you report is an issue.
Could you provide a test plan and write what you expect and what you get ?
Thanks
